name: NRG - Nice Robot Game
description:
You play a robot running on batteries, getting from room to room, which are randomly chosen.

  • Kill other robots to get “Dollas” and Batteries
  • Upgrade either all battery capacitys or your weapon’s damage at the end of a room
  • Enemys will get stronger each room
  • The more active you are, the more Energy is used
  • There is no health- or energy-bar
  • Your Energy is indicated by 3 different colors on your character and the amount of light you are emitting
  • If your Energy is 0, you will die

Instructions:

Controls:

  • Shoot: Left Click
  • Movement: A and D
  • Jump: Spacebar
  • Drop: S

Playing the game:

  • Kill NPCs and collect dropped money and batterys
  • Go through the door at the end to get to the next room
  • After each room you can either choose to upgrade batteries, your laser or keep the money you've collected.
